lead_paragraph: President Uhuru Kenyatta of Kenya commuted 2,747 convicts’ death sentences to life in prison on Monday, in a country that has not actually executed anyone since 1987.

headline.main: Kenya Spares the Lives of Everyone on Its Death Row

snippet: President Uhuru Kenyatta of Kenya commuted 2,747 convicts’ death sentences to life in prison on Monday, in a country that has not actually executed anyone since 1987....
